title: Looking for people to play casual norms with on OCE server
body: Just looking for some people to play with as most of my friends that I play league with have started to play other games and don't play league much anymore. My summoner name is Golden Reindeer. Please leave a comment if you add me so I know I'm not just getting random friend requests.

replies.body:
Hey mate, just sent you a friend request

Regards, Tundradragon

Hey, I am hoping that you are still playing League a lot and looking for people. I will add you and my name is FightingTheVoid :) I am also on Discord as well if you want to chat while playing. I do still have really dumb moments when I play though so fair warning.

add me, I want to play with u.
TRISS22

Hi there, Golden Reindeer!

I represent a discord based gaming community called AGC, I saw your post and thought you might be interested in what we have to offer. If you're looking for people to play with, we have heaps! We do regular events and even ranked teams if you feel so inclined. Discord link is below, join anytime! 

https://discord.gg/DwUMNDQ
IGN : purplerain14 !! see you guys on the rift :)
I will add you and Muzzle
